name: Lewd Anime Racing
description:
Play as a cute & excited contender in this racing challenge. Rise up the ranks and unlock lewd & NSFW collectible cards of former racers and world heroes.

Key Features

  • Unlock new drivers & cars -- The game features 3 cars, each sporting a different driver. Customize your ride with a color adjuster before the race.
  • Collect NSFW & lewd cards -- Former racers & world heroes all have cute, beautiful, and NSFW cards just waiting to be collected! Collect them using money won from racing then view & hear their voices in the shop.
  • Play with friends -- Friends and family make perfect lewd anime racing companions! Race against each other in thrilling local split screen.
  • Start at the bottom, race to the top -- L.A.R features increasing difficulties. The harder the challenge, the more you earn. The highest difficulty being so difficult that only the truly best of the best can hope to have a chance.
